thread.title: Jessica Jones Has No Patience for Stairs in New Teaser
thread.title_full: Jessica Jones Has No Patience for Stairs in New Teaser

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Jessica Jones Has No Patience for Stairs in New Teaser
text:
Comments Krysten Ritter's superhero character shows her superpowers again as she takes a shortcut to work in a new promo video. 
" Marvel's Jessica Jones " releases another teaser. After smashing her alarm clock and getting involved in a bar brawl , the feisty heroine played by Krysten Ritter is now going to work at Alias Private Investigations. It's "time to go to work," the show wrote on Twitter. The video begins with Jones taking a midnight stroll in Hell's Kitchen alone. She pauses in an intersection, makes sure that no one is around, and then makes a huge jump to her office on the fifth floor. No stairs are required for they are "overrated," the show explained on Facebook. Time to go to work. #JessicaJones https://t.co/XwZ7y3uwUM � Jessica Jones (@JessicaJones) October 6, 2015 The show will premiere November 20 n Netflix. It follows a young woman who battles demons from within and without after her short-lived stint as a Super Hero ended in tragedy. She is now rebuilding her personal life and career as a detective who gets pulled into cases involving people with extraordinary abilities in New York City.
